text: A re khutliseng go tlhola re ntse re boelela selo se le sengwe fela gangwe le gape, ka malatsi otlhe re ruta dithuto tsele tsa pele kaga Keresete. Go na le moo, a re tsweleleng pele mo dilong tse dingwe re bo re gole mo go tlhaloganyeng ga rona, jaaka Bakeresete ba ba nonofileng ba tshwanetse go nna. Tota ga re tlhoke go tswelela re buela pele ka boeleele jwa go leka go bolokwa ka go nna tshiamo, kgotsa ka botlhokwa jwa tumelo mo Modimong;
